channel.title: A little song i wrote
channel.description:
I've been waiting (waiting...) I've been killing (killing...) I've been sleeping(on the ground...) And I've died... ONLY FOR YOU!!!!
[Chorus:] DOES..THIS..SEEM..FAIR? To constantly waste my life I've been waiting... I've been dying... ONLY FOR YOU!!! It's not fair that I must, Haul my ass back and forth to you. I don't deserve this bullshit. I DOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOON'T!!!! [End Chorus]
No more... I won't take it... I'm not gonna ridicule myself. ONLY FOR YOU!!!
[Chorus]
Now you can do this yourself... I'm not taking this shit... ANYMORE!!!!
(Guitar Solo)
You could go and die... AND I WONT GIVE A FUCK!!
BECAUSE... IT'S... YOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOU!!!!
rate this please, and can someone help me think of a title?
I was thinking "Only for you"

I’ve been sleeping(on the ground…)
And I’ve died…
ONLY FOR YOU!!!

DOES…THIS…SEEM…FAIR?
To constantly waste my life
I’ve been waiting…
I’ve been dying…
ONLY FOR YOU!!!
It’s not fair that I must,
Haul my ass back and forth to you.
I don’t deserve this bullshit.
I DOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOON’T!!!
[End Chorus]

No more…
I won’t take it…
I’m not gonna ridicule myself.
ONLY FOR YOU!!!

[Chorus]

Now you can do this yourself…
I’m not taking this shit…
ANYMORE!!!

(Guitar Solo)

You could go and die…
AND I WONT GIVE A FUCK!!

BECAUSE… IT’S… YOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOU!!!

rate this please, and can someone help me think of a title?

I was thinking “Only for you”

I like the “You could go and die…
AND I WONT GIVE A FUCK!!” part… very original[/quote]

item.title: A little song i wrote
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

bullzeye:

I say take the “Fuck” and “Bullshit” and stuff out. It would probably be a better song. But yea I like it. Yea I was thinking “Only for You”.

Yeah I agree, but most of the ‘kids’/teenagers like to hear swears in songs, so they have a lot of swears in songs lol.

Read full topic

item.title: A little song i wrote
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Pretty couragous to post something you wrote. I don’t think I’d have the balls to do that.

If you want my advice I would say first write the music, and then lyrics to go with it. I don’t feel a meaning from it other then someone did you harm. 7/10 on lyrics because they aren’t bad. Maybe short though.

Read full topic
